LanguageData.CookSaltGrilledFish.label: Salt-grilled fish x4
LanguageData.CookSaltGrilledFish.description: Grill fresh fish and season with salt.
LanguageData.CookSasimi.label: Make Sashimi x4
LanguageData.CookSasimi.description: 白米,大根,野菜(果菜,葉茎菜,果物),魚の切り身,調味料で刺身定食を作れる。
LanguageData.CookSteamedFish.label: Make Boiled fish x4
LanguageData.CookSteamedFish.description: 白米,野菜(果菜,葉茎菜,豆菌),野菜(根菜,野菜加工,果物),魚類,調味料で魚の煮付け定食を作る。
LanguageData.CookOden.label: Cook Oden x4
